|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = FengLei;FLD04A09008NC; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Micron;N25Q064A; |flash2size = 8 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SO-DIMM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;; |ram1chipmodelfull = <!-- RAM1 full chip info --> |ram1_num = 8 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Intel;WGI211AT; |eth3chip = Intel;WGI211AT; |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53125; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = A8:C8:7F |oui = A8:C8:7F

|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1),, J4 |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI out, heatsink |addchip = 5A Low Dropout Linear Regulator;Anpec;APL5912;;1;,,, SMBUS Advanced Power Controller;Nuvoton;NCT3012S;;1;,,, DDR Termination Regulator;National Semiconductor;LP2998;;1;,,, Quadruple Bus Buffer Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC125A;;1;,,, 1+1 Voltage Regulator for IMVP-7/VR12 CPUs;Intersil;ISL95837;;1;,,, Single Supply Voltage Low Dropout Adj Regulator;Micrel;MIC69303;;2;,,, 14V 4A Step-Down DC/DC Î¼Module Regulator;Linear Tech;LTM4624;;1;,,, HDMI Companion Chip w/ I2C Level Shifting Buffer;TI;TPD12S016;;1;,,, 6-Channel (qSPI) 1/2 Multiplexer and Demultiplexer;TI;TS3A27518E;;1;,,, Dual 4MHz 3A Synchro Step-Down DC/DC Converter;Linear;LTC3615;;1;,,, 30V Dual N-Channel Enhance Mode MOSFET;Sinopower;SM7360EK;;2;,,, 30V 15A HEXFET Power MOSFET;International Rectifier;IRF9321;;1;,,, 16-Channel Fast-Mode Plus I2C Bus LED Driver;TI;TLC59116;;1;,,, 2 Channel 1A USB Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2066;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = roqos |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian, OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- 06/10/2015, --> 03/29/2013 |estreldate = 10/26/2016 |estprice = 223 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAKVHFMT7448 |asin = B071P3VT9C |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B01MF5RXX8 |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin3 = B071Z9XBPB |asin_country3 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Compex WLE900VX |rad1modif = Mini PCIe |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880;QCA9880-BR4A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1300 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Compex WLE200N2 |rad2modif = Mini PCIe (half) |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9287;AR9287-AL3A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ROQOS, INC." and "RC10 REV 4.2" are silkscreened on board top near Ethernet ports.
:"© 2016 ALL RIGHTS RESERVED" is silkscreened on board top near SATA connector.
:"PALWONN 88 M3" is silkscreened on board top near longest Mini PCIe slot.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Intel]]'' Quad-Core Atom (@1.91GHz) *Memory: 2GB DDR3L (SODIMM) *Storage: 4MB Serial SPI Flash, 8GB mSATA SSD, SATA Port *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 1x USB 3.0 ports *Power: 12V, 2A via barrel
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/09/26/roqos-core-ac-router-runs-debian-on-intel-atom-bay-trail-i-processor-for-19-plus-monthly-subscriptions/ ''Roqos Core AC Router Runs Debian'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/debian-based-wifi-router-adds-security-and-parental-controls/ ''Debian-based WiFi router'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/cloud-based-wi-fi-router-service-roqos-launches.34185/ ''Roqos Core RC10'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''' forums]
